title: FormBot
description: An interactive chatbot-based form builder with real-time analytics, leveraging the MERN stack.
Enabled dynamic form creation, data collection, and response visualization with customizable themes.
Integrated export functionality and responsive design to ensure a seamless and user-friendly experience.

title: Pocket Notes
description: Developed Pocket Notes, a responsive and intuitive note-taking app using React.js.
Integrated local storage for persistent data across sessions, ensuring notes are always accessible.
Enhanced user experience with responsive design and improved note organization by incorporating date and time information.

title: Link Trim
description: Built with the MERN stack, allowing users to create unique short links, set expiration dates, and efficiently manage their URLs.
The app includes click tracking, detailed analytics, and a responsive dashboard with pagination.
Additionally, it ensures secure user authentication with JWT tokens for a seamless login experience.
